translations: n.土豆；除草铲（spud 的复数）
v.用除草铲铲除杂草（spud 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Many people would only feed spuds to pigs.
sentences.translation: 许多人只是用土豆喂猪。

sentences.sentence: But when prepared in a healthy way, spuds can be a super nutritious food.
sentences.translation: 但是如果用健康的方式处理的话，马铃薯会是一种营养丰富的食品。

sentences.sentence: And though the celebrations of spuds and sisal may have happily passed you by, this one, I would suggest, is worth noticing.
sentences.translation: 尽管在土豆和剑麻的庆祝会中你可能过的很开心，但这一次我认为是很值得关注的。
